TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExpressionEditorInstance

Docs.summary: Represents an expression editor instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For a detailed description of an expression editor instance, see <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorService>.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptsReturn { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AcceptsReturn : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance accepts the RETURN key.
Docs.value: if the expression editor accepts the RETURN key; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptsTab { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AcceptsTab : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance accepts the TAB key.
Docs.value: if the expression editor accepts the TAB key; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanCompleteWord() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can complete the string being typed by the user.
Docs.returns: Always to indicate that the expression editor instance can complete the string being typed by the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanCopy() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can be closed.
Docs.returns: if the expression editor instance can be closed; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanCut() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the expression can be cut.
Docs.returns: if the expression can be cut; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanDecreaseFilterLevel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the filter level can be decreased when using Intellisense filtering.
Docs.returns: if the filter level can be decreased; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanGlobalIntellisense() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve global IntelliSense on the expression.
Docs.returns: Always to indicate the expression editor instance can retrieve global IntelliSense on the expression.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanIncreaseFilterLevel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the filter level can be increased when using Intellisense filtering.
Docs.returns: if the filter level can be increased; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanParameterInfo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve parameter information on the expression.
Docs.returns: A set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanPaste() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the expression can be pasted.
Docs.returns: if the expression can be pasted; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanQuickInfo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the expression editor instance can retrieve type information to be shown in an IntelliSense quick info tool tip.
Docs.returns: A set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanRedo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the system can redo the operation.
Docs.returns: if the system can redo the operation; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanUndo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the system can undo the operation.
Docs.returns: if the system can undo the operation; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearSelection() cil managed

Docs.summary: Clears the selection in the editor instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes and purges the editor items. This will close the specific expression editor instance.
Occurs when the expression editor instance is closing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CompleteWord() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the expression editor instance can provide a list of completions for the partial word typed by the user. For example, member, argument, and method names can be shown to the user in an attempt to help them complete the word they are typing.
Docs.returns: if this method succeeds; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Copy() cil managed

Docs.summary: Copies the active expression.
Docs.returns: if the copy is successful; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Cut() cil managed

Docs.summary: Cuts the active expression.
Docs.returns: if the cut is successful; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool DecreaseFilterLevel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Decreases the filter level to show all items in the Intellisense filter list and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
Docs.returns: if this method succeeds; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Focus() cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets focus on the editor instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetCommittedText() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the text used to generate an expression.
Docs.returns: The text used to generate an expression.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GlobalIntellisense() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves global IntelliSense on the expression in the expression editor and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
Docs.returns: if this method succeeds; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Occurs when the expression editor instance has aggregate focus.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasAggregateFocus As Boolean
public: property bool HasAggregateFocus { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the instance has aggregate focus.
Docs.value: if the editor instance has aggregate focus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The instance has aggregate focus when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> or any other control created by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> has focus.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::ScrollBarVisibility HorizontalScrollBarVisibility { System::Windows::Controls::ScrollBarVisibility get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::ScrollBarVisibility value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the horizontal scrollbar is visible.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostControl As Control
public: property System::Windows::Controls::Control ^ HostControl { System::Windows::Controls::Control ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a instance that can be used to display in the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IncreaseFilterLevel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Increases the filter level to show common items in the Intellisense filter list and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
Docs.returns: if this method succeeds; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Represents an event that is raised when the expression editor instance loses aggregate focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The instance loses aggregate focus when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> and every control created by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.IExpressionEditorInstance.HostControl%2A> loose focus.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxLines { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxLines : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of lines of text to be displayed by the control. This property implicitly sets the height of the control when growing to fit.
Docs.value: The maximum number of lines of text to be displayed by the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinLines { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MinLines : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the minimum number of lines of text to be displayed by the control. This property implicitly sets the height of the control.
Docs.value: The minimum number of lines of text to be displayed by the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ParameterInfo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves parameter information on the expression in the expression editor and returns a value that indicates whether this operation was successful.
Docs.returns: if this method succeeds; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Paste() cil managed

Docs.summary: Pastes the active expression.
Docs.returns: if the paste is successful; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool QuickInfo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether type information to be shown in an IntelliSense quick info tool tip.
Docs.returns: if this method succeeds; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Redo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Reapplies the last operation that was undone in the editor, that is, reverse the effects of the undo operation.
Docs.returns: if the redo is successful; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value of the text.
Represents an event that is raised when the text in an expression editor instance is changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Undo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Undoes the last operation in the editor.
Docs.returns: if the undo is successful; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::ScrollBarVisibility VerticalScrollBarVisibility { System::Windows::Controls::ScrollBarVisibility get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::ScrollBarVisibility value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the vertical scrollbar is visible.
